structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

text.section: The council shall adopt the plan provided for in subsection (1)(a) of this section by majority vote, at which time it shall become the policy document used by the Department for Local Government to determine priorities for the expenditure of training funds.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 53, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 46, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 69, sec. 33, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 2, effective July 14, 1992.
